content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0) processing iron ore

###Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) processing copper ore

###Electronic Circuit Production Line
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cable
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished circuits to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

###Science Production System
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(0.5, 31.5) storing automation science packs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs to lab
- Lab researching technologies

ERROR TIPS

###Research Technology Prerequisites
- Cannot research Automation 2 without first researching Logistic Science Pack technology
- Cannot research already completed technologies (Logistics, Automation)

###Recipe Requirements
- Cannot craft Logistic Science Packs without first researching the required technology

###Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into furnaces and burner inserters
- Monitor coal levels in boilers and furnaces to maintain continuous operation

###Production Issues
- Electronic circuit production is stalling due to missing iron plate ingredients - ensure steady supply of materials
